item.title: FAQ: RHOM coin
item.description: What is RHOM? Can I store RHOM on a hardware wallet? Where can I buy RHOM coins? Will RHOM be added to other exchanges? What is RHOM’s codebase? What are the transactions fees for RHOM? What are RHOM’s transactions sizes? What is RHOM’s inflation rate? Why has RHOM different privacy states? Are whitepapers available for the CT and RingCT privacy protocols? Is Segwit enabled?
